Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1982...
Injured on 5/12/1982 with a Bone Chips Elbow, out for 5 weeks...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1987...
Injured on 5/8/1987 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
